metadata.description: The misadventures of a sex-addicted cyborg humorously subvert classic science fiction and super-spy tropes. PUBLICATION IN 2 VOLUMES - COMPLETED WORK. The European Defense Organization (EDO) is entrusted with protecting the Earth from cosmic terrorists bent on the destruction of humanity. Their key weapon: a sex-obsessed secret agent by the name of Anibal 5. As Anibal and the rest of EDO's eclectic team battle evil dictators, nymphet clones, and a mysterious criminal syndicate, things turn inevitably, and irrevocably, delirious and erotic.
metadata.name: Anibal 5
